meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of autumn
meanings.sent1: The autumnally leaves turned vibrant shades of red and gold.
meanings.sent2: The pumpkin patch had an autumnally festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: She wore an autumnally colored scarf even in the summer.
meanings.sent4: The cozy cabin exuded an autumnally inviting aura.
meanings.sent5: The scent of cinnamon and apples was distinctly autumnally.

meanings.definition: occurring in or appropriate to the season of autumn
meanings.sent1: The autumnally harvest festival was a yearly tradition.
meanings.sent2: Her wardrobe transitioned to autumnally colored clothing.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored nuts in an autumnally organized manner.
meanings.sent4: The sky was painted with an autumnally breathtaking sunset.
meanings.sent5: The air felt crisp and autumnally refreshing.
